About the Company: Thomas Cook (India) Ltd is Indias largest travel and financial services company. The business divisions of the company includes: Travel-The company provides different travelling destinations for domestic inbound/ outbound holidays. Corporate Travel Management- The Company provides travel solutions and travel budgets for several large national and multinational companies.Foreign Exchange-The company is a leading foreign exchange provider offering wide range of product and services.Travel Insurance- Being the only travel company that has license to sell insurance,they co-brand travel insurance products with TATA AIG General Insurance Company.The company has also entered into a tie up with cruise line operator Indian Ocean Cruises of London based Foresight Smart Ventures in order to market heritage cruise Ms Ocean Odyssey in India and Mauritius.
